text: XHUACS-FM is a radio station serving Saltillo owned by the Universidad Autónoma de Coahuila. It is branded as Radio Universidad and broadcasts on 104.1 FM from its campus. The station came to air on May 8, 2013.UAdeC: "Inicia transmisión estación de radio universitaria Unidad Saltillo", 8 May 2013 It shares programming with XHUCT-FM 89.5 in Torreón, which is the other radio station operated by the university. ==References== Category:Radio stations in Coahuila Category:Mass media in Saltillo Category:University radio stations in Mexico
title: XHUACS-FM
